options.text: Hey! OMG How have you been?
GIRL!! You disappeared! Where the fuck have you been?

nodes.speaker: Kaila
nodes.message: I Have been well. How are you?

options.text: Im doing good. Its been so long since we talked
Besides waiting for you to finally contact me again, ive been doing great

nodes.speaker: Kaila
nodes.message: What do you mean? I have been here in New York. How are you?

options.text: Im doing good. Its been so long since we talked
Besides waiting for you to finally contact me again, ive been doing great

nodes.speaker: Kaila
nodes.message: What have you been up to? Besides waiting for me ;P

options.text: Im currently in uni studying for a bachelors, u?

nodes.speaker: Kaila
nodes.message: A bachelors? Good on you! I have been making a portfolio.

options.text: Dam, youre finally becoming an artist huh. Hey, if you have Sharespace, add me! My username is xXCloudXx

nodes.speaker: Kaila
nodes.message: Really? What did you think of it? Isn't it cool, neat and exciting?

options.text: Yeah... it looks pretty good
Is the art you post really made by you?

nodes.speaker: Kaila
nodes.message: Thank you! I have spent a long time working on my art now. It's not about skill, it's about expression.

options.text: Anyways, I got to go
Actually, no. I think that your faking it.

nodes.speaker: Kaila
nodes.message: Of course it is! I spent a lot of time creating the pieces I have posted on ShareSpace.

options.text: Okay... sory, it just looked a bit ai generated
I dont believe that

nodes.speaker: Kaila
nodes.message: That's okay. Everyone makes msitakes, and I can understand the fear-- especially in today's AI driven world..

nodes.speaker: Kaila
nodes.message: Hi, this test shows me starting the chat.

options.text: Hey Kaila!
Not now.
Talk later.

nodes.speaker: Kaila
nodes.message: Thanks for reaching out first! What's up?

options.text: Just testing.
All good.
Bye!
See ya!
